column2: "Thank you so much. That's... quite a weight off of my shoulders."
"I feel much better now, truly. I kept my feelings bottled up for so long that letting them all out had that effect on me."
"...nnhh... Ah, I'm sorry. I'm sorry, I'm okay now. I should be okay by now."
"Ahh, you made a girl cry!"
"Naughty, naughty!"
"Are you okay big sis? Did they do anything mean to you?"
"You were crying, are you sad? People cry when they're sad, after all, don't they?"
"Do not worry, it isn't anything like that! Thank you for your concern, though."
"Hmm... Adults sure are complicated..."
"Who are you?"
"Where did you come from?"
"Me? Well... My name's Flo!"
"Flo, may I ask where your parents are?"
"Hehehe, if you wanna know where I came from... That's a secret!"
"But forget that, come play with me, you two! This is a place to play in, right?"
"If you play then you won't wanna cry anymore! Come on, come on, doesn't that sound nice?"

"Yes, I suppose so...
That is why we came here, after all."

"<%me>...
Do you recognize that boy?"
"He gives off a different feeling, but..."
"He looks just like [Double]..."
"Yes... The resemblance to Dark Falz [Double] is uncanny."
"It must be the same thing that happened to Luther. That child must be the original [Double]. It's certainly curious..."
